quote.registrar: Computershare Hong Kong Investor Services Ltd.
quote.issuer_name: China Communications Construction Co. Ltd. - H Shares
quote.nm: China Communications Construction Co. Ltd. - H Shares
quote.summary: China Communications Construction Co Ltd is a China-based company principally engaged in the infrastructure construction businesses. The Company mainly operates through four business segments. The Infrastructure Construction segment mainly provides engineering services for the construction of infrastructure such as ports, roads, bridges, and railways. The Infrastructure Design segment mainly provides consulting and planning services, feasibility studies, survey and design, engineering consultancy, engineering surveying and technical research, project management, project supervision, and general contracting. The Dredging Engineering segment mainly provides engineering services such as infrastructure dredging, maintenance dredging, environmental dredging, and reclamation. The Others segment mainly include material sales, fund investment, equipment manufacturing and others. The Company distributes its products within domestic market and to overseas markets.
